definitions: any of a number of brightly colored or boldly marked fish of warm waters.

notes.text: a reef-dwelling fish that is popular in marine aquariums (Chaetodon and other genera, family Chaetodontidae)
a predatory marine fish that bears long venomous spines (genus Pterois, family Scorpaenidae)

shortDefinitions: reef-dwelling fish that is popular in marine aquaria

definitions: a West African freshwater fish with large pectoral fins used in leaping out of the water and long fin rays used as stilts.

notes.text: Pantodon buchholzi, the only member of the family Pantodontidae

shortDefinitions: West African freshwater fish with large pectoral fins used in leaping out of water and long fin rays used as stilts
